subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family is associated with the building of Amer Fort?
question_hi: अमेर एफट को कौन सी राज्यवादी की संरक्षण में लिया गया था?
explanation_en: The Amber Family is associated with the construction of Amer Fort, not Kumbhalgarh Fort. Amer Fort was built by Raja Man Singh I of the Kumbhalgarh Family.
explanation_hi: अमेर कालकोणी कालकोणी का निर्माण कर्मचारी अमेर कालकोणी निर्माण कर्मचारी अमेर कालकोणी
question_hi: अमेर कालकोणी किस्माण कर्मचारी अमेर कालकोणी
